title: so nothing after 7 years of playing the fuking game
body: your not going to review my fukin ban from 4 people blowing me in for no fukin reason all game then surrendering the game when we are about to win , did i mention get the enemy team to flame me as well cause i was doing good for 45 mins then u send me my fukin chat ban witch is me being passive to there fukin racism and flaming,,, what the actual fuck i thought u care about your old school players more than some fukin trolls who jump on to fuck people of you lost a player iv rakt up more than 450 DAYS play time on your fukin game since season 1 and you cant even review me i guess thats where u say from seeing the way you type i can tell your toxic first time flaming thanks for taking hundreds of dollars and countless hours in return for nothing

replies.body: Your rant needs evidence. No point in flaming riot without evidence.
how do i get my chat logg
riot send your chat log and why you are banned to the email of your account.

8 instances of "fukin" or "fuck" in your post (rant).

I think I understand why you were banned.

Cheer up buddy, it's just a game.

common mate 45mins getting flamed for no reason then a ban when they surrender just before were going to win OK i swore a lot i was angry i haven't been banned in 7 years the people coming into the game are ruining it how are u supposed to cheer up

From what I understand you don't get a perm ban the first time, you get suspended or chat restricted first. Perm bans I would of thought would be for multi offences so.....
45 minutes without muting..... just mute flamers its not hard.
how do i find my chat log obviously i was a little angry because of the ban for being passive 7 years no ban does that not say enough
